text: SoundHound, Santa Clara US/San Francisco US/Toronto Canada, ONSITE Data Engineers, Speech, Search and AI, Front-end Engineers and more: http://app.jobvite.com/m?3uCiQhw0 I'm a Software Engineer/Hacker at SoundHound. Hound came out of beta recently, as well as our speech platform Houndify which is now powering voice recognition in SoundHound as well. We're hiring in many more roles than the ones I listed here so check out our apps, API and our careers page! http://app.jobvite.com/m?3uCiQhw0 https://www.soundhound.com https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCXVfDSAcpnhMCYGPuFGFIMw/vid...
